summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ingersoll Place, from 20th Avenue South to 21st Avenue South; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 91223 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
